name: dmcnvcnv

body.origin:
|- wceq(cdm(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), cdm(c0))
-| wceq(cdm(c0), crn(ccnv(c0)))
-| wceq(crn(ccnv(c0)), cdm(ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
body.pretty:
⊢ dom(`' `' c0)= dom(c0)
⊣ dom(c0)= ran(`' c0)
⊣ ran(`' c0)= dom(`' `' c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cdm(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), cdm(c0))
-| wceq(cdm(c0), crn(ccnv(c0)))
-| wceq(crn(ccnv(c0)), cdm(ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ dom(`' `' c0)= dom(c0)
⊣ dom(c0)= ran(`' c0)
⊣ ran(`' c0)= dom(`' `' c0)

comment: The domain of the double converse of a class (which doesn't have to be a relation as in ~ dfrel2 ). (Contributed by NM, 8-Apr-2007.)
